Text.Value: What's that?
Allow me to be frank - we can't presume we'll get to share another night like this; there's a battle coming. Not everyone is going to make it.
A Nightfall ritual - an act of wickedness and decadence in Lady Shar's name?
I thought we were finished, you and I.
You expect me to participate in some Sharran ritual? Clearly you don't know me well.
Lady Shar demands my heart, and I give it to her freely. But there's more to me than a heart, and I'd like to indulge you. Just this once.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Leans in slightly for 'just this once'
EditorData.NodeContext: Leans in slightly and whispers 'just this once' sotto voce. Maximum flirtation.

Text.Value: We should make an offering to Lady Shar, to seek her blessing and protection against what lies ahead. A Nightfall ritual.
Help me do this. You will not regret it.
Not fatalistic - pragmatic. We should do everything we can to tilt the odds in our favour. That's what I wanted to talk to you about.
We are finished. But that doesn't mean I don't have uses for you... and perhaps you for me.
And my... company. But no matter; there's willing flesh elsewhere. Sleep well, if you can.
I'm glad you feel the same. We should do everything we can to tilt the odds in our favour. That's what I wanted to talk to you about.
Lady Shar's followers honour her with an act of wickedness, carried out in her name. Then, they feast, knowing they carry the Nightsinger's blessing anew.
As you wish.
Precisely. Care to show your devotion? Just say the word.
Why me?
I suppose you might be right.
Do I truly need to explain? You made me who I am. Now I'd like to show you the fruits of your labour.
Don't be so fatalistic.
If I don't have much time left I'd rather spend it enjoying myself than praying.
Not interested.
Wait until the others are asleep, then come with me. It might just save your life...
Faith is one thing I have in plentiful supply. In fact, it's what I wanted to talk to you about.
A beautiful night. Not even a hint of moon to sully Lady Shar's dark sky.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Note - SH should not look up at a night sky as it can't be presumed it's visible at this moment. She's just talking in general.
EditorData.NodeContext: Note - SH should not look up at a night sky as it can't be presumed it's visible at this moment. She's just talking in general.

Text.Value: I know you perfectly. You helped usher me into being who I am. Indulge your darker side - with me.
We can leave the kneeling and praying to the rest. The Nightsinger prefers a more active form of devotion. An act of wickedness, carried out in her name, followed by a feast.
We've made it this far. Have a little faith.
Your loss then. If you're struck down in the battles to come, remember that you refused Lady Shar's shield.

Synopsis: CRD for Shadowheart on the Shar Path inviting the avatar to a romance scene. She wants help in conducting a nightfall ritual in order to win Shar's favour before they face the final battles.
